mapper.select:
select nvl(bo.c,0) from (select r from room where a = #{a}) ro left outer join (select r, count(b) c from booking where bcheckin between to_date(#{checkin},'YY/MM/dd') and to_date(#{checkout},'YY/MM/dd') -1 or bcheckout between to_date(#{checkin},'YY/MM/dd') +1 and to_date(#{checkout},'YY/MM/dd') group by r,a having a = #{a}
) bo on ro.r = bo.r order by ro.r
mapper.insert: insert into booking(b,r,u,a,mid,bcheckin,bcheckout,bcount,writedate,cancle,cancledate) values (bookingsq.nextval,#{r},#{u},#{a},(select mid from accomodation where a = #{a}) ,to_date(#{bcheckin},'YY/MM/dd'),to_date(#{bcheckout},'YY/MM/dd'),#{bcount},sysdate,0,null)
mapper.select: select count(b) from booking where ( bcheckin between to_date(#{checkin},'YY/MM/dd') and to_date(#{checkout},'YY/MM/dd') -1 or bcheckout between to_date(#{checkin},'YY/MM/dd') +1 and to_date(#{checkout},'YY/MM/dd') ) and r = #{r}
